channel.title: Dropbox on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in Dropbox on Machine Learning

item.title: Install Dropbox for Headless Servers
item.description: ref-DigitalOcean Install # 64 bit: cd ~ wget -O dropbox-linux-x86_64.tar.gz https://www.dropbox.com/download?plat=lnx.x86_64 && \ sudo mkdir -p /opt/dropbox && \ sudo tar xzfv dropbox-linux-x86_64.tar.gz --strip 1 -C /opt/dropbox && \ sudo ln -s /opt/dropbox/dropboxd /usr/bin/dropboxd && \ dropboxd & for 32 bit OS the url is: xxxx?plat=lnx.x86 Install Command Line Interface (CLI) [Optional] # cd ~ sudo wget -O /usr/bin/dropbox.py https://www.dropbox.com/download?dl=packages/dropbox.py && \ sudo chmod +x /usr/bin/dropbox.py && \ ln -s /opt/dropbox ~/.
